import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import {UserDetail} from '../store/actions/user' import FormContainer from '../components/formcontainer' const UserEditScreen = ({match, history}) => { const userId = match.params.id const [name, setName] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [isAdmin, setIsAdmin] = useState(False) const dispatch = useDispatch() const userDetail = useSelector(state => state.user) const {loading, userInfo, error} = userDetail useEffect(() => { }, []) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return ( Go Back

Edit User

{loading ? : error ? {error}: (
Name setName(e.target.value) }> Email Address setEmail(e.target.value) }> setIsAdmin(e.target.checked) }>
) } ) } export default UserEditScreen
